TEXT.TITLE: HARTFORD NATIONAL UNIT <HNAT> SETS CHINA PACT
TEXT.BODY:
Hartford National Corp said the China Industry Commerce and Development Corp agreed to work exclusively with its Connecticut National Bank unit in banking business between China and all six New England states. The company said China Industry Commerce will provide import and export assistance, economic and business information, contacts and introductions.
Reuter
